### About me

I'm an Industrial Data Scientist and my main interests are in:

* Design of Experiments
* Measurement Science
* Process Control

I am active in the in the manufacturing industry since 22 years, starting with Philip Morris, then Rolex and now with Nestl√©. Having held numerous positions in R&D, Operations and IT I have a broad understanding of how consumer goods are conceived, industrialized and manufactured.

My background is Mechanical Engineering from the [IST](http://ist.pt/) with a Project Management certification from [PMI](https://www.pmi.org/) and a Data Science certification from [DataCamp](https://www.datacamp.com/). Currently I'm specializing in Data Visualization at the Swiss technical university [EPFL](https://www.extensionschool.ch/).
